titles: The lattre examinacyon of Anne Askewe latelye martyred in Smythfelde, by the wycked Synagoge of Antichrist, with the Elucydacyon of Iohan Bale.
author: Askew, Anne, 1521-1546.
Bale, John, 1495-1563.
place: [Imprented at Marpurg in the lande of Hessen [i.e. Wesel :
publisher: Printed by D. van der Straten],
notes: The imprint is false; actual publication information from STC.
Printed vertically on right side of title page next to illustration: Anne Askewe stode fast by thys veryte of God to the ende.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
